name: 汪昆立
objective:
介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
**視疫情影響可能調整授課順序、講授內容、教授方式、評量方式和配分比例。
schedule:
1. Mass Spectrometry and Infrared Spectroscopy
2.Nuclear Magnetic Resonance  Spectroscopy
3.Conjugated Compounds and UV spectroscopy
4.Benzene and Aromaticity
5.Chemistry of Benzene
6.Alcohols and Phenols
7.Ethers and Epoxides
8.Middle Examination
9. Carbonyl Chemistry
10.Aldehydes and Ketones
11.Caboxylic Acids and Nitriles
12.Carboxylic Acid Derivatives
13.Carbonyl alpha-Substitution Reactions
14.Carbonyl Condensation Reactions
15.Amines and Heterocycles
16.(Final Examination)
scorePolicy:
Usual activity  & Homeworks (40 points)
Middle Examination (30 points)
Final Examination (30 points)
Additional bonus (10 points)
materials:
Textbook: “Organic Chemistry”, John McMurry, 9th Edition, ISBN 978-1-305-08048-5Cengage Learning, 2016, 歐亞書局代理
References: “Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry”, Solomons/ Fryhle/ Synder, 12th Edition, ISBN 978-1-11992-317-6, Wiley, 2016, 歐亞書局代理
